body: It's now too late to do this in Go 1.6. It would need to be reintroduced in a non-freeze time, such as early in Go 1.7. That said, please consider whether doing a shallow clone fetches all the necessary tags for the go command to do its tag-based checkout selection. If a shallow clone does not fetch all the necessary tags, then a separate tag fetch would be needed, and if that's not possible then we can't do shallow clones at all.
